The Player class represents a player in the game.

PlayerDoesNotExistException - Exception Class in main.java.helpers.exceptions
The PlayerDoesNotExistException class represents an exception that is thrown when attempting to access a player that does not exist in the game.
PlayerDoesNotExistException(String) - Constructor for exception class main.java.helpers.exceptions.PlayerDoesNotExistException
Constructs a PlayerDoesNotExistException with a detail message indicating that the player with the specified name does not exist.

Manages the loop for player actions during the gameplay phase.

Allows players to issue orders during their turn.
PlayGame - Class in main.java.controller
The PlayGame class manages the gameplay mechanics including assigning countries to players, issuing reinforcements, issuing orders, and executing orders.
